Jetstorm: Alright now. Daemos wanted us to make the cargo hold of the 
ship into a troop transport one. Let's see..

He enters and takes a look. There are many compartments divided by 
metal panels. Also, a small rail system allows a ceiling-hooked crane 
to grab stuff and move them around. Contrary to everything else that 
is Tripredacus, it is a technologic fighter.

Jetstorm: So... what about you remove the panels while I block that 
crane?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> -- Anachronox --
> 
> The large bot shakes himself out of his self-induced trance, and 
> nods. "Alright." He starts to run after Jetstorm.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Jetstorm looked at Anachronox intensely.
> > 
> > Jetstorm: Hey! Were you even listening? Now hurry up and come with 
> me, 
> > we're going to modify the ship's cargo bay.
> > 
> > He leaves for the exit.
